ComicInfo.Summary:
Examples of people mishandling power tools.
Army Man escapes being tied to a rocket.
Coombs gets a discount tattoo.
A man flushes himself down the toilet.
A child asks his great grandfather how he reached old age.
A tree grants a lumberjack a wish.
How to make protest signs.
